bibl.title: Some Coins of Artaxerxes and Other Short Texts in the Demotic Script Found on Various Objects and Gathered from Many Publications.
bibl.note: Reprend plusieurs inscriptions bilingues (démotique-grec): cf. Nos 27; 98-99; 118; 152; 163; 175; 182; 184-186; 198; 204-205; 207; 250; 260.
bibl.seg: VLEEMING S.P., Some Coins of Artaxerxes and Other Short Texts in the Demotic Script Found on Various Objects and Gathered from Many Publications. (Studia Demotica. 5.)
Leuven - Paris - Sterling, Virginia, Peeters, 2001, 8°, xxxviii-342 pp., nombr. figg. et 8 pll. ISBN 978-90-429-1061-4. €50.
Reprend plusieurs inscriptions bilingues (démotique-grec): cf. Nos 27; 98-99; 118; 152; 163; 175; 182; 184-186; 198; 204-205; 207; 250; 260.
